definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Ive come to inquire about a five-thousand-pound remittance from London.
sentences.chinese: 我来查问一笔从伦敦汇来的五千英镑汇款。

sentences.english: Could you find out whether there's a remittance for me from Guangzhou?
sentences.chinese: 能不能请您查一查是否有我的一笔自广州来的汇款？

sentences.english: We have a right to your remittance confiscated .
sentences.chinese: 我们有权利把你的汇款充公。

sentences.english: Please send the remitter address to us, since we can not read the fax clearly.
sentences.chinese: 请发汇款人地址给我们，因为传真上看不清楚。

sentences.english: How long does it take to receive the money by Western Union?
sentences.chinese: 通过西联汇款方式要多长时间可以取到钱？

sentences.english: The buyer's capital will be tied up from the time of remitting it until the goods arrive and are sold.
sentences.chinese: 从汇款时起直到货物到达和销售掉，买方会积压资金。

sentences.english: All banker's charges inside China if any are to be borne by remitter .
sentences.chinese: 所有产生的中国境内的银行费用由汇款人承担。

sentences.english: A prompt remittance would be appreciated.
The remitting bank will charge their clients a small fee for this service.
sentences.chinese: 汇款银行在这项服务上向客户收取少量的手续费。

sentences.english: Can I have this money order cashed?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在这儿兑现汇款单吗？

sentences.english: The workers send money home to support their families. These are called immigrant remittances.
sentences.chinese: 他们寄钱回家，以养家糊口，这称为移民汇款。

sentences.english: The urgent remittance can be drawn with 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 加急汇款则可在2小时内取款。

sentences.english: Can I have this money order cashed, please?
sentences.chinese: 请问可不可以把这张汇款单兑现？

sentences.english: My friend didn't receive my remittance.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友没有收到我的汇款。

sentences.english: What's the cost for 400 yuan remittance to Shenzhen?
sentences.chinese: 往深圳寄400元汇款的汇费是多少？

sentences.english: the other picked up the wired money for orders that would never ship.
sentences.chinese: 另一个人负责将订购者的汇款取走。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
to withdraw money from a bank
to withdraw money/to take money out of the bank
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)
to pay a sum of money/payment
